canvas module¶

class canvas.Canvas(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget

Canvas inherits QWidget and is the area that displays the image and handles the drawing, resizing, and moving the shapes.

CREATE = 0¶
EDIT = 1¶
boundedMoveShape(shape, pos)¶

Move a shape to a new position. :param shape: The shape that the user moves. :param pos: The position that the user moves the given shape to.

boundedMoveVertex(pos)¶

Move the vertex of a shape. :param pos: The position that the user moves the vertex to.

boundedShiftShape(shape)¶

This is called after the user duplicates a shape. This method automatically translate the new box so that they are not entirely overlapping. :param shape: The duplicated shape.

calculateOffsets(shape, point)¶

Calculate the offsets between the shape and the point. :param shape: The shape. :param point: The point.

canCloseShape()¶
Returns:True if the shape can be closed (has 4 points).
closeEnough(p1, p2)¶

Returns the distance between a point and epsilon. This helps the user select a point of shape even if they’re a few pixels off, which improves responsiveness. :param p1: Point 1. :param p2: Point 2. :return: True if the distance between p1 and p2 is less that epsilon. False otherwise.

copySelectedShape()¶

Called whenever the user duplicates the selected shape. :return: The copied shape.

deSelectShape()¶

Called when the user clicks off of a selected shape.

deleteSelected()¶

Called whenever the user deletes the selected shape. :return: The shape that the user deleted.

drawing()¶
Returns:True if the user is currently drawing a shape. False otherwise.
drawingPolygon¶
editing()¶
Returns:True if the user is currently editing a shape. False otherwise.
endMove(copy=False)¶

Called whenever a user has finished moving a box. :param copy: bool value that tells whether the user has just duplicated a box or not.

enterEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever the mouse enters the canvas area. :param ev: The event.

epsilon = 11.0¶
finalize()¶

Helper method that’s called when a shape is finished being drawn.

focusOutEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever the focus leaves the canvas area. :param ev: The event.

handleDrawing(pos)¶

Handles the drawing of a box. :param pos: The position of the box.

hideBackgroundShapes(value)¶

Only hide other shapes if there is a current selection.

intersectingEdges(x1y1, x2y2, points)¶

For each edge formed by points’, yield the intersection with the line segment `(x1,y1) - (x2,y2), if it exists. Also return the distance of `(x2,y2)’ to the middle of the edge along with its index, so that the one closest can be chosen. :param x1y1: Point 1. :param x2y2: Point 2.

intersectionPoint(p1, p2)¶

Cycle through each image edge in clockwise fashion, and find the one intersecting the current line segment. http://paulbourke.net/geometry/lineline2d/ :param p1: Point 1. :param p2: Point 2. :return: The point that intersects with the current line segment.

isVisible(shape)¶

Returns True if the shape is visible. :param shape: The shape object :return: True if the shape object is visible. False otherwise.

keyPressEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever a key is pressed. :param ev: The event.

leaveEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever the mouse leaves the canvas area. :param ev: The event.

loadPixmap(pixmap)¶

Load the pixmap of an image. Repaint the canvas after. :param pixmap: The pixmap of an image.

loadShapes(shapes)¶

Load the shapes onto the canvas. Repaint the canvas after loaded. :param shapes: The list of shape objects.

minimumSizeHint()¶

Required for the scroll area.

mouseDoubleClickEvent(ev)¶

This event is called whenever the user double clicks on the canvas. :param ev: The event.

mouseMoveEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever the user moves the mouse while drawing, resizing, or moving a box. :param ev: The event.

mousePressEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever the user clicks to draw, move, or resize a shape. :param ev: The event.

mouseReleaseEvent(ev)¶

This event is triggered whenever the user releases the mouse after drawing, moving, or resizing a shape. :param ev: The event.

moveOnePixel(direction)¶

This method moves the selected shape one pixel in the given direction. :param direction: The direction as a string [Up, Down, Left, Right]. :return:

moveOutOfBound(step)¶

Move the shape of out bounds. :param step: The amount of pixels to move it out of bounds. :return: True if any of the points are out of bounds.

newShape¶
offsetToCenter()¶

This method helps the image remain in the center during zooming. :return the point that is the center of the image.

outOfPixmap(p)¶
Parameters:p – The point.
Returns:True if the point p is outside of the image’s pixmap. False otherwise.
overrideCursor(cursor)¶

Override the cursor method of QApplication :param cursor:

paintEvent(event)¶

Updates the entire canvas, including the current bounding boxes, the vertices, and the currently selected box. :param event: The event.

resetAllLines()¶

Reset all of the lines in the last shape.

resetState()¶

Reset the canvas.

restoreCursor()¶

Restore the override cursor of QApplication.

scrollRequest¶
selectShape(shape)¶

This is called whenever the user selects a shape. :param shape: The shape that the user selects.

selectShapePoint(point)¶

Select the shape which contains the given point. :param point: The point the user clicks on.

selectedVertex()¶
Returns:The vertex that the user has currently selected.
selectionChanged¶
setEditing(value=True)¶

Set the canvas to editing mode when the user is resizing or moving a shape. :param value: bool that tells if the user is editing or not.

setHiding(enable=True)¶

Hide the background shapes. :param enable: bool value that tells whether the shapes can be hidden.

setLastLabel(text)¶

Set the last label that was given for a shape. :param text: The label.

setShapeVisible(shape, value)¶

Set a shape to be visible or hidden. :param shape: The shape to hide or shoe. :param value: Bool. If true, shape is shown. If false, shape is hidden. :return:

shapeMoved¶
sizeHint()¶
transformPos(point)¶

Convert from widget-logical coordinates to painter-logical coordinates. :param point: The point to convert.

unHighlight()¶

Clear the highlighting color from the inside of a shape when the user mouses out of the shape’s location.

undoLastLine()¶
wheelEvent(ev)¶

Event is triggered whenever the mouse wheel is scrolled. :param ev: The event.

zoomRequest¶
canvas.bin(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
canvas.hex(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
canvas.oct(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
